articles.description: Former India fielding coach R Sridhar has revealed that Hanuma Vihari sacrificed his spot for the team's cause and went up to him saying that he shouldn't be playing in a home Test against South Africa. Vihari has only played one home Test match so far. The r…
articles.content:
In 2019, Hanuma Vihari came forward to sacrifice his spot for the team's causeVihari has only played one home Test match in his career
